name: The Butter Chicken Castle
description:
You're walking by the castle when you smell the delicious Indian dish butter chicken. You'd love to go take it, but there's a guard blocking the gate. Convince him to let you in, so you can grab that scrumptious butter chicken! There are 9 possible endings. Click to advance text, double tap outside the text box to speed up text.

This was made for Jame Gam for the theme Unintended Side Effects and special item Butter Chicken.
